title: Show layout copying speed in the Output Window when deploying to remote device.
body:
When you're deploying Windows Store App to a remote device, it says in the output window:
1>Creating a new clean layout...
1>Copying files: Total 205 mb to layout...

comments.body: 20 min for deploy 200Mbyte app are a very big waste of time. No usb connection. Commodore 64 performance on quadcore and high speed network. No progress bar, no info, no speed. No words about poor quality of last products.

An idea on how to speed this up would be great too. Eventually larger deploys (90mb+) seem to time out and do nothing. Could I deploy via USB for clean layouts for example? This is a big waste of time when a clean layout occurs.
